member.name: T:PDFCropper.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: 一个强类型的资源类，用于查找本地化的字符串等。

member.name: P:PDFCropper.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: 返回此类使用的缓存的 ResourceManager 实例。

member.name: P:PDFCropper.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: 使用此强类型资源类，为所有资源查找 重写当前线程的 CurrentUICulture 属性。

member.name: T:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ComboBox
member.summary: This ComboBox inherits from System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox. Comparing with the System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox, this ComboBox can set its height and padding independently. So, the base line of its text can overlap with the base line of the TextBox's text.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ComboBox.ItemFont
member.summary: This variable is used to replace the member variable Font. The member variable Font is just used to control the height of this ComboBox. This variable is used to draw the text of this ComboBox.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ComboBox.#ctor
member.summary: This is the constructor of the ComboBox.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ComboBox.Me_DrawItem(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)
member.summary: This sub is used to draw the items in the ComboBox.

member.name: T:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration
member.summary: This class is used to read and save the configuration of this program.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.DataSet
member.summary: The configuration is saved in a DataTable of a DataSet.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.DataTable
member.summary: This is the DataTable.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.Name
member.summary: This name is the DataTable's name.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.Path
member.summary: This variable is used to save the configuration file path.

member.summary: This is the constructor of this class.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.Load(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used to load the configuration from a file. If the loading process is successful, return true, else, return false.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.GetTagValue(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used to get the value of a tag name. If there is no the tag name, return an empty string.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.SetTagValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This sub is used to set the value of a tag name.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.Configuration.Save
member.summary: This sub is used to save the configuration into a file.

member.name: T:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.RichTextBox
member.summary: This RichTextBox inherits from ystem.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox. This RichTextBox fix the font bug of System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.RichTextBox.LockWindowUpdate(System.Int32)
member.summary: This function is used to lock update of the RichTextBox.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.RichTextBox.#ctor
member.summary: This is the constructor.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.RichTextBox.OnTextChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the event TextChanged.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.RichTextBox.TextFontUpdate
member.summary: There is a font bug of System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox which is dscribed as follows. If there exists a character and it is not in the Me.Font, the System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox will assign this character's font with other font. But, the font of the characters behinds this character is not Me.Font. It looks strange. This sub is used to fix this font bug.

member.name: T:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip
member.summary: This class is the menu which will be shown when the right button of mouse is clicked.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.OpenFilesMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to open a dialog to select the PDF files which user want to crop.

member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to set whether the FormMain is topmost.

member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to exit the program when it is clicked.

member.summary: This is a memu item which is used to select the opacity of the FormMain.

member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to choose the back color of the FormMain.

member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to choose the fore color of the FormMain.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainTopMost
member.summary: This is a boolean to represent whether the FormMain is topmost. When it is assigned a value, its checked state is changed. Then raise the event TopMostMenuItem_Click.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainOpacity
member.summary: This is a double to represent the opacity of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, checked states of the corresponding sub items are changed. Then raise the event OpacityMenuItem_Click.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainBackColor
member.summary: This is a color to represent the back color of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, the image of this item will be assigned the image of its sub item, whose color is equal to the value. Then raise the event BackColorMenuItem_Click.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainForeColor
member.summary: This is a color to represent the fore color of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, the image of this item will be assigned the image of its sub item, whose color is equal to the value. Then raise the event ForeColorMenuItem_Click.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainFontSize
member.summary: This is a integer to represent the font size of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, checked states of the corresponding sub items are changed. Then raise the event FontSizeMenuItem_Click.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainFontName
member.summary: This is a string to represent the font name of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, checked states of the corresponding sub items are changed. Then raise the event FontNameMenuItem_Click.

member.name: T:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.TransparentPanel
member.summary: This class is a panel which is tansparent. This class is used to cover the other control, which should be click by mouse.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.TransparentPanel.#ctor
member.summary: This is the constructor.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.TransparentPanel.CreateParams
member.summary: CreateParams is a property of Control object. CreateParams is used to gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created. In this class, we override the property CreateParams, and set the ExStyle = ExStyle Or 0x20 to make the background is trasparent.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.TransparentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: We override the sub OnPaintBackground to prevent the background of this panel from being painted.

member.summary: This class inherits System.Windows.Forms.TextBox. Comparing with System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxthe, this WaterMarkTextBox can show a water mark when it is empty.

member.summary: This is the water mark which is shown when the WaterMarkTextBox's text is empty.

member.summary: This is the constructor.

member.name: T:PDFCropper.FormMain
member.summary: The instance of this class is the main form of this program.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.RichTextBox
member.summary: This RichTextBox is used to show the message of the software.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.TransparentPanel
member.summary: This TransparentPanel is used to prevent the RichTextBox from being clicked by mouse.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.ContextMenuStrip
member.summary: This ContextMenuStrip is shown when the right mouse button is clicked.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.MouseDownLocation
member.summary: This Point is used to record the location where mouse button is pressed down.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.FormLastLocation
member.summary: This Point is used to record the last location of the FormMain.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.Configuration
member.summary: This Configuration is used to read and to save the configuration of the software.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.ConfigurationPath
member.summary: This constant string is used to save the configuration file path.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.GhostScriptBinFolder
member.summary: This variable string is used to save the bin folder path of the GhostScript.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.PDFFilePool
member.summary: This ArrayList is the pool of PDF files which will be cropped by this software. If the PDF file in this pool has been cropped by this software, it will be removed from this pool.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.CropPDFThread
member.summary: This Thread is used to crop the PDF files which are in the "PDFFilePool".

member.name: T:PDFCropper.FormMain.DelegateDisplayMessage
member.summary: This delegation is used to display message on the RichTextBox from another thread.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.DisplayMessageForInvocation
member.summary: This is an instance of DelegateDisplayMessage, and it is used to be invoked by Me.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.MarginWidth
member.summary: The width of white space which will be left in the new PDF file.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.CurrentPDFFile
member.summary: This variable is used to save the path of the PDF file which is being crpped.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.AutoExit
member.summary: If this flag is true, after cropping the PDF files which are in the PDFFilePool, the program will exit.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.#ctor
member.summary: This is the constructor of FormMain.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.CheckArguments
member.summary: This sub first check whether there are running arguments. If there is no running argument, exit this sub directly. If there are running arguments, add this arguments into the PDFFilePool, assign the flag AutoExit to true, and start the PDFCropThread.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.InitializeContextMenuStrip
member.summary: This sub is used to configurate the ContextMenuString of FormMain according to the configuration file.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.InitializeMainInterface
member.summary: This sub is used to configurate the interface of the FormMain according to the configuration file.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.ExistItemInWindowsContextMenu
member.summary: This sub is used to check whether there exist Windows context menu item for PDF file according to the registry.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.FormMain_KeyDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Because the shotcut of context menu can not be triggered, this sub is used to capture the key down event of the FormMain. This sub first check which menu item is triggered, then call the corresponding sub.

member.summary: This event is triggered when something are dragged into the TransparentPanel.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.ContextMenuForPDFFile_Click(System.Object)
member.summary: This event is triggered when ContextMenuForPDFFile of the ContextMenuStrip is clicked. This sub calls the Toolkit.exe with different parameters to add or remove the context menu for PDF file.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.TransparentPanel_DragDrop(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)
member.summary: This sub is triggered when something are dropped into the TransparentPanel. This sub first obtains the path of each file, then pulls them into the PDFFilePool. At last, it starts the PDFCrop thread.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.OpenFilesMenuItem_Click
member.summary: This event is triggered when OpenFilesMenuItem of the ContextMenuStrip is clicked. If user selects some PDF files, this sub pulls them into the PDFFilePool. At last, it starts the PDFCrop thread.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.StartPDFCropThread
member.summary: This sub is used to start the PDFCrop thread.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.NewArgumentsReceived(System.String[])
member.summary: This sub is triggered when MyApplication_StartupNextInstance in ApplicationEvents.vb is triggered. This sub pulls the new arguments in to the PDFFilePool, then starts the PDFCrop thread.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.CropPDF
member.summary: This sub is used to crop the PDF files which are in the PDFFilePool.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.GetPDFRectangles(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function is used to get the rectangle list from the output string of the GhostScript.
member.param: The output string of the GhostScript.
The width of margin which you want to keep.
member.returns: The return is an ArrayList. Assuming that there are N pages in the PDF file, the length of the ArrayList is N.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.GetPDFRectangle(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used to get the rectangle from the BoundingBox string. For example, the BoundingBox string is "0 0 100 100", this function will return a new rectangle with these for parameters.
member.param: The string of BoundingBox.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.GetPDFRectangle(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function is used to get the rectangle from the BoundingBox string.
member.param: The string of BoundingBox.
The width of margin which you want to keep.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.GetNewFileName(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used to get the nuew file name with prefix and suffix.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.DisplayMessage(PDFCropper.FormMain.MessageType)
member.summary: This sub is used to display message on the RichTextBox according to the MessageType.

member.name: T:PDFCropper.FormMain.MessageType
member.summary: This enumeration is message type which is used to control the sub DisplayMessage to show different messages.
